document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

bibRefCitation.author: Wiltshire, E. P.
bibRefCitation.refString: Wiltshire, E. P. (1957) The Lepidoptera of Iraq. N. Kaye, London, 162 pp., 17 pls.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cossus cossus kossai
Wiltshire, 1957 , Lep. Iraq : 145.

LT: Shaqlawa [ Iraq ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

Cossus cossus omrana
Wiltshire , 1957
, syn. n.

Cossus cossus omrana
Wiltshire, 1957 , Lep. Iraq : 144.

LT: Iraq , Haj Omran. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

Diagnosis.
Cossus cossus omrana
Wiltshire, 1957 and
C. cossus kossai
Wiltshire, 1957 were described from close localities in the Kurdistan of Iraq (Haj Omran and Shaqlawa) by Wiltshire in 1957. The distance between these two localities is 50 km . Moreover, no significant morphological differences were found among the examined material (including the type series) of both subspecies. Therefore, here
C. cossus omrana
Wiltshire, 1957 is considered as junior synonym of
C. cossus kossai
Wiltshire, 1957 , syn. n.
